title: Sunrise Jog & Juice
description: Start your day with a group jog around campus, ending with fresh juice and chill vibes.

title: Golden Hour Photowalk
description: Explore campus or a nearby neighborhood snapping aesthetic photos during golden hour.

title: Group Cooking Challenge
description: Collaborate on themed recipes (e.g., everything-but-the-kitchen-sink stir fry). Ingredients provided!

title: Wholesome Baking Bash
description: Make cupcakes, cookies, or banana bread together—decorating is half the fun.

title: Power Hour Group Study
description: Work on assignments together—timed sprints with lofi beats, snacks, and a little accountability.

title: Study + Snacks Jam
description: A more casual study sesh with snack breaks and comfy beanbags. BYO project or readings.

title: Board Game Night
description: Classic games, party games, weird ones you’ve never heard of—pick a table and join in.

title: Strategy & Snacks Night
description: For the Settlers, Codenames, and Secret Hitler crowd. More thinking, same snacks.

title: Cozy Movie Night
description: Blankets, fairy lights, and a vote on what to watch (comedy? thriller? Studio Ghibli?).

title: Outdoor Movie Under the Stars
description: Big screen, open lawn, popcorn included. Just bring a hoodie.

title: Themed Dance Party
description: A costume-friendly, light-on-pressure dance event (Y2K night, Silent Disco, or Glow Fest).

title: No-Context House Party
description: Vibes only. No explanation needed. Expect spontaneous dance-offs and weird conversations.

title: Cardboard Boat Race
description: Build boats from boxes. Hope. Float. Sink.

title: Nature Journaling Walk
description: Walk, sketch, and reflect in the uni gardens.

title: Speed-Friending
description: Meet new people via 5-minute convos and silly icebreakers.

title: Two Truths & a Lie Tournament
description: Compete to deceive and detect in a fun, chaotic game night.

title: Silent Disco in the Courtyard
description: Everyone’s dancing… to different beats. BYO headphones.

title: Flash Mob Rehearsal + Surprise Performance
description: Learn a dance routine together and randomly perform it on campus.

title: Escape Room Classroom Edition
description: DIY escape room setup with clues, props, and mild chaos.

title: Capture the Flag Night
description: Classic outdoor team chaos with glowsticks, stealth, and strategy.

title: Murder Mystery Mixer
description: Come in character and solve a dramatic mystery.

title: Courtyard Hide-and-Seek
description: Childhood rules, campus edition. Play hide-and-seek in the courtyard with creative hiding spots and friendly chaos.
